metadata.title: CVE-2020-13899 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in janus-gateway (aka Janus WebRTC Server) through0.10.0. janus_process_incoming_request in janus.c discloses informationfrom uninitialized stack memory.

criterions.comment: janus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
